column4: How to install the dialier? my modem is connected to the linux and the light is working, the modem is usb adsl
if it's dsl, you don't need a dialler - you probably need to run 'sudo pppoeconf'
it finds the network card but not the usb modem
does your dsl use pppoe or dhcp ?
my model of the usb is access runner
does ifconfig show your usb modem?
but i installed firmware and all that things
unplug the modem, tail -f /var/log/messages, plug it back in - what's the output?
what the url of the site that i past there log and it gives me link to the log???
here's a driver for your modem - I can't see anything in the repos: http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=47406&package_id=144429
how do i install the drivers?
unpack them, there'll be a README
theres no readme at this driver http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=47406&package_id=144429 i dont know how to install
